scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run server
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd .. && rimraf build && cpy "**/*" build --cwd=client/build
scripts.test:env: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run build && npm run start:test
scripts.prod:env: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && npm run start:prod
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm run build
